channel.title: Port Forwarding on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Port Forwarding on TLDRBins

item.title: Network Traffic Pivoting
item.description: chisel metasploit ssh socat sliver General # Start a local chisel server ./chisel server --reverse --port 8000 $ ./chisel server --reverse --port 8000 2024/09/23 12:27:03 server: Reverse tunnelling enabled 2024/09/23 12:27:03 server: Fingerprint ikFn6iQOOodxIlcDQI4dvFu1pdHgV5UnHRenxUg0eho= 2024/09/23 12:27:03 server: Listening on http://0.0.0.0:8000 Ports Forwarding # In target machine ./chisel client <LOCAL_IP>:8000 R:<TARGET_PORT>:<TARGET_IP>:<TARGET_PORT> ./chisel client 10.10.14.1:8000 R:3000:127.0.0.1:3000 # Mutiple ports forwarding, can be different targets in the same subnet ./chisel client <LOCAL_IP>:8000 R:<TARGET_PORT_1>:<TARGET_IP_1>:<TARGET_PORT_1> R:<TARGET_PORT_2>:<TARGET_IP_2>:<TARGET_PORT_2> .
